cause.description:
College campuses are overrun by liberal professors, students and left-leaning campus newspapers. We train students to counteract their impact. We aim to help students expose the injustices often overlooked by campus newspapers.
1. The liberal bias in the media needs to be countered by conservative publications.
2. Conservative students need a voice on campus.
cause.mission: We will establish conservative newspapers on college campuses.
cause.name: Conservative Student Journalism
